name: Gtools
desc: Faster (3-50x) implementation of collapse, reshape, xtile, tabstat, contract, egen, isid, winsor, levelsof, distinct, and more using C plugins.

name: Stata and Big Data
desc: Stata tips for working with large datasets, based on my presentation for Banco de Portual's 2022 Workshop on Empirical Research with Large Datasets.

name: Tablefill
desc: Fill in LyX and LaTeX tables using a placeholder system.
